work.title: Code Reviewer - Freelance
work.description: As a Code Reviewer. I am responsible for completing and own the quality of, the technical code reviews CogGrammer provides to our international partners (some of the biggest brands in technology,recruitment, and education headquartered in the US, UK, and Europe). A growth mindset is essential forthis position because, at any point in time, I could be invited to work on an advanced-level curriculumor a new technology stack in order to meet the requirements of our partners. Therefore, continuoustraining, further learning, and specialization is an integral part of this role.

testimonials.text: That Leon Stevens must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
